title: Can't open client because of constant bugsplat
body: Everytime I open the client, it loads for a while until a bugsplat message pops up. It does the same thing again until I eventually have like 10 bugsplat windows. I've tried reinstalling League  but the problem still persists.

replies.body: Disable Discord Overlay. Saw a guy in the comments here say it, and it works. I don't get it either, but that should fix it.

Happened to me as well, as well as my brother, sadly my brother decided to wipe his computer to try and fix. When it happened to me I just started league  with the "Run as Administrator" option and it loaded perfectly.

This is happening to me too.
I turned off the Discord Overlay, but while I'm in the middle of a game, it turns itself back on somehow and the bugsplat keeps interrupting my gameplay.
This is likely being caused by Discord Overlay.  Disabling that should do the trick!
Why would this be the problem?
